agents_and_ml.content: TaskMaster agent uses reinforcement learning for dynamic task scheduling. Key metrics: execution_time, error_rate, resource_usage, and completion_status affect the reward function.
Auto-approval threshold starts at 0.75 and adapts based on historical performance. Confidence scores below threshold require human approval.
RL model hyperparameters: learning_rate=0.001, discount_factor=0.95, exploration_rate=0.1. Model artifacts stored in ./model-registry
Reward weights: execution_time=-0.3, error_rate=-0.5, resource_usage=-0.2, completion_status=1.0, user_feedback=0.8
Reinforcement learning configuration: learning_rate=0.001, discount_factor=0.95, exploration_rate=0.1. Models stored in ./model-registry with MLflow tracking.
Auto-approval mechanism uses adaptive thresholds starting at 0.75. Threshold adjusts based on historical performance and human feedback.
Context monitoring tracks system_load, memory_usage, active_tasks, and queue_length to adjust task scheduling priorities.

workflow_patterns.content: Task branching uses confidence scores to determine auto-approval eligibility. Scores below threshold require human review.
Asynchronous tasks implement notification callbacks through notify_task_event tool with COMPLETED or FAILED status.

security_config.content: API keys and sensitive configurations stored in environment variables. Database credentials never exposed in code.
